title: Dawnbringer/Nightbringer Skins
body: Hey quick question guys! Will the skins still be available after the event or will it only be for this event? Thank you!

replies.body: You do have to get the borders now though
Thanks for the update! I'll get right on that! Basically the skins are staying but the other little goodies aren't
Yep yep! Those skins should be sticking around in the shop for awhile after the event so you don't necessarily have to buy them right now ^_^!
